post.body: me too! I already have an imaginary band called "God Damn". :)
I've been looking into lifestreaming software recently, Sweetcron seems like the best solution out there so far
didn't get the email :( could you resend it to dudes @ sprawsm com
just remembered that we formed a band yesterday. Good times…
is making a killer 80s playlist with Spotify
is enjoying his new iPhone case, I should have gotten one when I first got the phone, now it has some scratches
is on Wikipedia while watching TLOTR2 looking up info and shit
is seriously pissed about the fact that his site is still down. And this hangover doesn't help…
hit me up if you need Spotify.com invites, I got 5
has a brass band under his window playing so loud I can't hear my music playing. Fuck yeah!
jel neko zna koji kurac se desava sa Goranovim serverom? Down je od juce… :/
got virtual hosts working on my fresh Leopard install. Ahh, free of MAMP at last… Not that MAMP is bad, just running OS X's Apache is better
New year's celebration has begun. TLOTR, snacks and wine - awesomeness.
has reinstalled Leopard, it was surprisingly painless, especially because I had a Time Machine backup which I restored. #Apple #OSX
is preparing to reinstall Leopard
calling it a day, man we got LOADS of requests for pads, thanks people, we'll see to ship those as soon as possible!
all people wanting pads — email me your addresses so we can send them out asap!
Goodies from Superawesome http://bit.ly/goodies-from-superawesome
People wanting goodies: stay tuned! :)
http://twitpic.com/xltx - Superawesome goodies are back from the printer's! Here's a quick preview
